creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of Mr. and Mrs. George McKay Reid
description: Sculptural abstraction featuring an elliptical red and orange object that fills most of the picture plane; a circle in its center consists of interweaving yellow lines; heavier lines around the object's center spiral outwards towards its border; a chain-like, turquoise design adorns background. Print with hand-drawn additions.
medium: Drypoint and collaged aquatint, lithograph, pastel and graphite
signed:
LR: [John Newman 1985 (obscure)/Working Proof/First Version (Reject)]
Verso: [FOLD OUT (WORKING PROOF - FIRST VERSION)]
title: Fold-Out
